title: CyberLink Media Suite Ultra v13.0.0713.0 Multilingual Incl Keyma
description:
The Most Complete Multimedia Software Package - With CyberLink Media Suite 13, you have a complete set of software that will meet all your digital needs, at one great value price. Featuring CyberLinkÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s collection of multi-award winning software, Media Suite 13 truly is the most complete multimedia software collection.

Stop Searching, Start Doing!
CyberLink Media Suite's unique PowerStarter makes it quick & easy to access any Media Suite application. With PowerStarter's intuitive interface, finding the application you need is child's play. Select from:

- Movie - Play Blu-ray movies, DVD discs & movie folders, plus explore movie info
- Video - Create, play, edit, organize, and upload your videos
- Photo - View, organize, edit and upload photos
- Music - Play, convert & edit audio files
- Data & Backup - Burn and copy discs, as well as back-up your personal files
- Utility - Mount virtual drives, manage discs and more

Easily Create Pro-quality Video
- Easily create professional quality H.265 and UltraHD 4K video
- Easily add video effects, transitions and more thanks to the simple interface
- Create titles, menus, PiP motion, and particle effects in a full screen editor
- With timeline, accurately control and design creative animation effects
- Enjoy fast and seamless video editing thanks to CyberLink's TrueVelocity technology

Capture the Shot. Create Spectacular Photos.
- All the features you need for photography in a single workflow
- Bring your photos to life with complete editing and adjustment tools
- Non-destructively adjust your shots, including those shot in RAW
- Touch up group shots & portraits with unique people beautification tools
- Use presets to create dramatic, stunning HDR images quickly and easily

Create Stunning DVD & Blu-ray Discs
Complete disc authoring tools to turn your photos and videos into Hollywood-style Blu-ray and DVD discs. Supporting the latest media formats and rendering videos faster than ever before, it's the only disc authoring tool you need.

Precision Audio Editing
WaveEditor lets you record voice, and use the trim, cut and mix tools to edit audio files. You can also reduce noise or enhance digital audio with rich effects. Save and convert tracks in different formats including wav, wma, mp3, and m4a files, and turn your favorite music into mobile ringtones!

The Truest Home Theater Experience
- Cinema-like audio-visual experience with new next-gen TrueTheater enhancements
- Enhanced playback of Ultra HD 4K video on large 4K displays
- Resume watching movies and TV series right from where you last left off
- Enhanced Media Library keeps all your movies and TV shows in one location
- Support for an extensive range of video, audio and image formats

Organize, Find & Share Your Photos
Effortlessly organize and find all your personal photos and videos with FaceMeÃ¢â€žÂ¢ face tagging technology. Create outstanding media slideshows, and share your media content quickly on disc.

All-in-One Disc Burning
- Leading burning software trusted by leading PC & burner hardware manufacturers
- Drag & Drop widget for super quick burning
- 256-bit encryption keeps your data safe once it's on disc

Fast Media Converter
- Convert media files from your PC or laptop to play on your portable devices fast
- Pre-configured profiles for over 100 of the latest smartphones, tablets and portable players
- Smart Detect Ã¢â‚¬â€œ automatically selects the optimal file format / resolution for your media based on your device
- Convert videos to and from the new HEVC (H.265) format
- Conversion that actually improves the quality with TrueTheater enhancement technologies

Operating System:
- Microsoft Windows 10, 8.1/8, 7, Vista

New in CyberLink Media Suite 13 Ultra:
- PowerDirector 13 (New!)
- PhotoDirector 6 (New!)
- PowerDVD 15 (New!)
- Power2Go 10 (New!)
